question: The National Clean Air Programme (NCAP) is in news recently. Which of the following true about NCAP? 1.Central Pollution Control Board will execute the programme. 2. It is a state level programme.
explanation: CPCB will execute this programme at national level. And it is also a state level program. National Clean Air Programme was launched by the centre It proposes a target of 20%-30% reduction in PM2.5 and PM10 concentrations by 2024, with 2017 as the base year for comparison.
